about_the_game:
THIS DEMO IS NOT COMPLETE

Currently this demo is identical to my previous game, AXIAL: Prototype, but this should be enough to give you an idea of how the game feels to play. I am currently working on a better demo, stay tuned!

Action Phase


During ACTION PHASE, you are free to consider your options with no time limit. You may do one of the following:
  • Do Basic Attack With No Cost
  • Do skills at the cost of your Mental Points (MP)
  • Use items to aid yourself in combat
  • Charge to recover more MP
After you do one action, BATTLE PHASE will commence.

Battle Phase



During BATTLE PHASE, enemies will actively attack you in real-time.
  • MOVE in 4 directions (up, down, right, and left) as long as you stay inside unbroken light-colored tiles
  • Do basic ATTACK by pressing Z key
After 10 seconds have passed, ACTION PHASE will commence again, and the cycle continues.

name: AXIAL NULL Demo
short_description: AXIAL NULL is a hybrid tactical roguelike, combining both Turn-based and Real-time elements into its core gameplay. Immerse yourself into The Void, erasing as many Anomalies as you can in a grid-based combat inspired by Megaman Battle Network series!
